player.comment: I'm reporting in for patrol duty.
I found the pirate base and scanned it.
We ran into ships which looked like Terraformers!
We need to inform the USC
I would like to take part in the escort.
I am very interested in working for your race.

player.text: May I help you with something?

npc.text: I got a job for you if you would like to help me out

player.text: Sure, just show me what Job that is

npc.text: So as you can see I would like you to scan some asteroids for me. The Payment is good so will you accept the Job?

player.text: No scanning Roids is boooring, go find someone else...
No thanks I dont like you so piss off...

npc.text: Ahh great. Would you show me the results please...

player.text: Sure... Here they are... I hope you found what you wanted

npc.text: Ah yes they look very good... thanks for your Work, here is your reward.
Hm yeah not what I expected but still... Here is your reward.

player.text: Sure... Here they are... I hope you found what you wanted

npc.text: Ah yes they look very good... thanks for your Work, here is your reward.
Hm yeah not what I expected but still... Here is your reward.

player.text: Yes you may have them, but I'll keep a copy for myself...

npc.text: Ah yes they look very good... thanks for your Work, here is your reward.
Hm yeah not what I expected but still... Here is your reward.
